pkgmetadata.longdescription: Official Realtek r8168 linux driver. The following cards are currently supported: RTL8111B RTL8168B RTL8111 RTL8168 RTL8111C RTL8111CP RTL8111D(L) RTL8168C RTL8111DP RTL8111E RTL8168E RTL8111F RTL8411

use.flag: Enable use of hardware acceleration by default. HW acceleration may cause problems on Realtek NICs!
Keep set MAC address for S5 by default
Enable wake from S5 by WOL by default
Enable support for automatic firmware loading
